column1: [Highlight] Reginald Jackson with the huge slam on one end and Mfiondu Kabengele with the huge denial on the other.
[Charania] The Cleveland Cavaliers are signing forward Mfiondu Kabengele to a 10-day contract, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium .
[Shams] The Cleveland Cavaliers are signing forward Mfiondu Kabengele to a 10-day contract, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium .
[Stein] Jabari Parker and Mfiondu Kabengele have also cleared waivers, league sources say
[Stein] Jabari Parker and Mfiondu Kabengele have also cleared waivers, league sources say
[Woj] Cleveland Cavaliers F/C Mfiondu Kabengele is signing a deal for the rest of the season and non-guarantees on 2021-2022 and 2022-2023, sources tell ESPN.
[Cavaliers] The Cleveland Cavaliers have waived C Mfiondu Kabengele and G Brodric Thomas
[Cavs] OFFICIAL: #Cavs waive C Mfiondu Kabengele and G Brodric Thomas.
The three picks after Mfiondu Kabengele were Jordan Poole, Keldon Johnson, and Kevin Porter Jr.

[GLeague] Former Clippers 1st round pick Mfiondu Kabengele puts up 26 points on 10-20 shooting (2-5 from 3, 4-6 FT), 16 rebounds (5 OREB), 2 assists, 3 steals, and 2 blocks in RGV's 112-105 win over Birmingham!
